Reaction:: N-(benzyloxycarbonyl)-L-aspartyl-L-phenylalanine methyl ester(aq) + H2O(l) = N-(benzyloxycarbonyl)-L-aspartic acid(aq) + L-phenylalanine methyl ester(aq)
Reference:: Oyama K.; Irino S.; Harada T.; Hagi N.; in "Enzyme Engineering 7"; A.I. Laskin G.T. Tsao and L.B. Wingard eds.; New York Academy of Sciences New York (1984); pp. 95-98
Buffer:: No specific buffering system was used.  The pH was adjusted with NaOH.
